alert.note: Alert for Acadia; Lafayette; Vermilion (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 06 at 4:58PM CDT until April 06 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lake Charles has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Lafayette Parish in south central Louisiana... Southern Acadia Parish in southwestern Louisiana... North central Vermilion Parish in southwestern Louisiana... * Until 530 PM CDT. * At 458 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Morse, or near Gueydan, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Crowley, Rayne, Gueydan, Duson, Morse, Riceville, Wright, Lyons Point, Indian Bayou, Estherwood and Midland. This includes Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 75 and 90. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
